title: Drawing, "The Adoration of the Shepherds", ca. 1730
medium: Red chalk on cream laid paper
signed: Lower margin in graphite: Bernardo (crossed out) de Dominici / 2 g - a 120 (price drawn over with ink).
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund
description: In a rustic shelter, Mary is semi-reclining on a bed of straw, watching over the infant Christ in a cradle, surrounded by marvelling shepherds.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "The Adoration of the Shepherds", ca. 1730.
ca. 1730. Red chalk on cream laid paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund. 1938-88-7076.
